text: That should help lightening the mood!

Probably my favorite album!
Oh, this is a classic!

We're so happy here, simply jamming together
Best family ever!

Open sesamy!

Oh, I forgot that was here!
Final door!
No trophy can bring me as much pride as you all do
Looks like the trophies should be packed here
Dun, dun, dun... Another one bites the dust!
Guess that makes me dust in the wind
Oh yeah, Ghostdusters!
Can you pick it up?
You can probably clean the living room dust with that
I... can't see anything, it's too dirty
I can clean it with something now..
AAAAAAA... a ghost
Puff! Hey look what I get!
I guess it can be used to clean stuff?
It should be filled with record
I can't believe this whole thing…
It's like he is still sitting in that sofa, waiting for us coming back…
That's.. the ball that he played a lot with him.
I can't, I can't understand the whole thing!
Aha! Wait? What? Where am I? I thought I finally hit the "Respawn" Button!
Am I.. A ghost now? What the…
Oh hey you poor child.. Do you want to play again?
I really don't know if we can do this again…
Wow! It works!
We still have lots of work to do here…
I know, I just , I can't focus on them…
Yeah me too.. Look at all the things he left…
…Time for work buddy. Guess we need to do something to cherry them up.
